fullText:
A quiet admission:

I‚Äôm deeply proud of the life I‚Äôve helped build for my 8-year-old son.

But some nights, I lie awake‚Ä¶
Afraid I might ruin it all for him.

This is the paradox of abundance ‚Äî and how I‚Äôm trying to navigate it as a parent.
